@scenario.begin Scenario: User deletes a review Given The site "http://127.0.0.1:5000" is opened ... passed in 0.213s Given The website "http://127.0.0.1:5000" is opened ... passed in 0.186s When The user clicks on the "movie" that choose ... passed in 0.528s When The user click on "delete review" button ... passed in 0.828s Then The number of reviews should decrease by 1 ... passed in 2.180s
